t:
The devil said I can only meet you as long as I stand in the shadows of the cave.
I can't be here always, but I've a pickaxe, a shovel, a truck and a plan.

If I can't take you away, I'll take the cave instead.

Stone by stone.
Shadow by shadow.
c:
What'd you do to take them away?





#devil #cave #trapped #shadow #trick #alwaystogether #trickinglife #backfromthedark
